channel.title: Help with my 508 server
channel.description:
Hello everyone me again lol. Sorry this is the last thing i will need to complete my server.
Well everytime, I get new items and stats and stuff like ill go and log out you know i just found this bug and like i log back in and everythings gone and my stats are reset. Got any idea? What it is if so will you please help me thanks alot like if theres a code i need to add or a place to look to change something just post it here thanks people.

item.title: Help with my 508 server
item.dc:creator: @cbk666 cbk666
item.description:
@cbk666 wrote:

Thanks i fixed =). My servers done!

Read full topic

item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

Check the logout method/packet/etc. See if it even saves and correctly.
